hudson.tasks.Shell.command: cd /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/vagrant_config/ && sudo /usr/bin/vagrant destroy -f $JOB_NAME cd /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/vagrant_config/ && sudo /usr/bin/vagrant up $JOB_NAME # Sed apt source in fr because my ci is in france cd /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/vagrant_config/ && sudo /usr/bin/vagrant ssh $JOB_NAME -c "sudo -i sed -i 's@http.us.debian.org@ftp.fr.debian.org@' /etc/apt/sources.list"

cd /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/vagrant_config/ && sudo /usr/bin/vagrant ssh $JOB_NAME -c "sudo -i apt-get update; sudo -i apt-get install -y git" cd /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/vagrant_config/ && sudo /usr/bin/vagrant ssh $JOB_NAME -c "git clone https://github.com/enovance/numeter" cd /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/vagrant_config/ && sudo /usr/bin/vagrant ssh $JOB_NAME -c "sudo -i BRANCH="master" \$PWD/numeter/extra/sources_test.sh --go"
